game.name: Maiden And Lord-DLC-Lafayette Special-Body Movement
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: 《소녀와영주》는 캐주얼한 전략 전쟁 게임으로, 플레이어 간 협력과 문명 발전을 강조합니다. 혁신적인 "개인 영지"와 "안전 채집" 등의 시스템을 도입해 번영과 조화로운 이세계를 창조합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Maiden And Lord" is a relatively casual strategy war game that emphasizes player cooperation and the development of civilizations. It introduces innovative mechanisms such as "Private Territory" and "Safe Gathering," creating a prosperous and harmonious otherworldly realm.
